Title: Math-C1 Lesson 10-11
Content: 本节课我们学习 17-18课时Math 数学课 Chapter 1. Lesson 10-11主要学习内容如下:【1】通过一个数学课件讲述主人公在马戏团的不同表演,通过表演中涉及的物品,引导孩子们明白One more than(比….多一个)的概念【2】学习的关键词有juggle(玩抛接杂耍),pin(瓶子),balance(保持平衡),cup(杯子),alarm(闹钟), Corn cob玉米棒,tractor拖拉机【3】复习了等价物的概念。Creating Representation of numbersHow many chips show one pin? One chip shows one pin. How many chips show two pins? Two chips show two pins. 本节课的关键句是: What is one more than one/two/three/four/five/six/seven/eight/nine?One more than one/two/three/four/five/six/seven/eight/nine is two/three/four/five/six/seven/eight/nine/ten.您可以在家引导宝贝儿用关键句表达以下数学公式:6+1=7 One more than six is seven. 7+1=8   One more than seven is eight. 8+1=9 One more than eight is nine.... ...   ...  ...  关于等价物的概念今后我们会反复复习的，您不用担心孩子现在没有掌握哈。感谢您的配合!

Title: Math-C2 Lesson 1-9
Content: 本节课我们学习 19-20课时Math 数学课 Chapter 2. Lesson 1-9主要学习内容如下:【1】通过一个make soup做汤的数学课件,不断把蔬菜加进去,引导孩子们用数学语言去理解.【2】引导孩子们预测下一种可能的蔬菜,引导孩子们回忆How many carrots are there?There are three toys. They are... 通过构建思维导图,来帮助孩子们建立回想数字的能力.【3】本节课复习到的蔬菜有: carrots胡萝卜, corn玉米, onion洋葱, tomato西红柿. 生词有: pot锅; crunchy脆的; crow乌鸦; an ear of corn一穗玉米; soup bowl汤碗【4】There are five apples. Draw more to show seven apples. 理解5+?=7的等式关系,等式的读法是: Five and what number is seven.

Title: Math-C2 Lesson 10-11
Content: 本节课我们学习 21-22课时Math 数学课 Chapter 2. Lesson 10-11【1】学习ordinal number序数词的概念, 结合之前学习过的基数词,即 one two three…,引导孩子们理解两种表达方式的对应关系, 序数词用于表示第几时使用. 学习了1-5 的序数词表示法, first第一, second第二, third第三, fourth第四, fifth第五.【2】生词有:Joey幼兽,pouch育儿袋,plate盘子,worm蠕虫,koala考拉,orangutan猩猩,camel骆驼.【3】通过数学课件一个讲述工厂里修玩具toys的小故事,对于不同的broken toys的点数,引导孩子们明白等价物之一chip的用法,同样数量的物品可以用同样数量的chip来代替表示;学习的broken toys有jack-in-the box（玩偶匣）,unicycle（独轮车）,car,toy animal 【4】引导孩子们回忆How many toys are there?There are four toys. They are... 通过构建思维导图,来帮助孩子们建立回想数字的能力.【5】本节课的关键句是: How many chips show one jack-in-the box? One chip shows one jack-in-the box.How many chips show two unicycles/three fishing-poles(钓鱼竿)/four bagels(面包圈)/five bowling pins(保龄球)?Two/three/four/five chips show two unicycles/ three fishing-poles(钓鱼竿)/ four bagels(面包圈)/ five bowling pins(保龄球).

Title: HSP-U2 L4-5 Living&Nonliving
Content: 本节课我们学习23-24课时 HSP 科学课 Unit 2 Animals. Lesson 4-5 Living&Nonliving主要学习内容如下:【1】能够理解Living Things and Non-living Things生物和非生物的区别:课堂上我们通过一首歌及老师的图片、肢体语言,引导孩子们理解-A living thing need water (can drink).【2】A living thing need food (can eat).  A living thing need air (can breathe). A living thing can move. A living thing can grow. 能够在生活中找到Living Things and Non-living Things生物和非生物;能够识别看到的任一物体是Living Things 生物还是 Non-living Things非生物.【3】学习有关生物与非生物的小文章,关键词有: living thing生物, nonliving thing非生物, water水, food食物, place to live栖息地, new plants新植物, ducks鸭子. 关键句是: Living things need food and water. They also need a place to live. Do nonliving thins need these? Plants can make more plants. Animals can have young. Can nonliving things do this?

Title: LA-U2 L3 Signs
Content: 本节课我们学习 25-26课时Language Arts语文课Unit 2 Animals Around. Lesson 3 Signs标志主要学习内容如下:【1】引导孩子们学习了高频词汇the,并学会用the 造句. 关键句是: Do you see the puppy?【2】用看图说话的方式,学习了关键词balloon气球,gift礼物,ball球,friends朋友.学习了小故事The Party. I like the balloons. I like the gifts. I like the balls. I like the party.【3】引导学生学习7个生活中常见的标志:Stop Sign, Traffic Light, Crosswalk, Bike Lane, Exit, Railroad, Recycle Sign,并学会用肢体动作表现这些标志.【4】关键句是: It’s a Stop Sign/Traffic Light/Crosswalk/ Bike Lane/an Exit/Railroad/ Recycle Sign.

Title: HSP-U2 L6 What do Animals need?
Content: 本节课我们学习 27-28课时 HSP科学课 Unit 2 Animals. Lesson 6 What do Animals need?主要学习内容如下:【1】学习What are animals like? 简单了解动物的6大分类,引导学生通过big大small小,light轻heavy重,腿的数目来描述动物;【2】学习动物的body covering动物的身体覆盖,主要有五个物质:shells贝壳,scale鳞片,feather羽毛,fur皮毛,skin皮肤.云盘上我们分享了PPT,方便您在家引导宝贝儿每种覆盖物的代表动物;【3】学习了小文章Many Animals. 内容是: fur毛皮, feathers羽毛, scales鳞. Blue jay冠蓝鸦, lady bug瓢虫, elephant大象. Animals have different shapes and sizes. Some animals have bright colors. Koala考拉, frog青蛙, spider蜘蛛. 小书内容如下：Many animals have a head and eyes.  Some animals have 2 legs. Some animals have many legs. Swim, crawl, walk and run, hop, fly.  Animals move in different ways.  Which animal hops?  Which animal swims? Which animal walks and runs?【4】学习What do animals need? 动物生长需要的四种物质:Food食物,water水,home(shelter)居住地,以及air空气.【5】学习了小文章What Animals Need? 内容是: food, air, water, shelter.Animals need food, water and air—just like you. Animals need shelter—just like you. Pets need people to give them food, water and shelter.【6】简单学习了一本小书The animal quiz这本小书主要要求孩子们能根据描述来指出相应的动物.学习的主要动物特征为A fly can go up. It can zig and zag and buzz(发出嗡嗡的叫声).A dog can run here and there .It can nap(打瞌睡) and go ruff(woof-woof).A duck can give us an egg and. It has a bill(喙) and can fly.

Title: LA-U2 L4 Letter M
Content: 本节课我们学习 29-30课时Language Arts语文课Unit 2 Animals Around. Lesson 4Letter M主要学习内容如下:【1】学习了高频词and和,并学会用and造句.关键句是: A worker has a saw锯子 and a hammer锤子.【2】认识字母M并了解以字母M开头的单词.【3】掌握字母M的发音并能在文章中找出以/m/音或者letter M开头的单词【4】引导孩子们回想以/m/发音的单词,如mask,mouse, milk, mango, mushroom, muffin, mouth, moon, monkey, 等【5】学习了小文章I like Mm. I like the moon. I like the mouse. I like the milk. I like the milk and the muffin.本节课的关键句是:【1】What is the letter? (这是什么字母?)It’s letter M【2】Which word begins with letter M? (哪些词是以字母M开头的单词?)Moon/Mouse/Milk/Muffin begins with letter M. 【3】Please circle the word which begins with letter M? (请圈出以M开头的单词)【4】What sound does letter M make? （M发什么音?）M makes the sound /m/.【5】Please circle the word that begins with the sound /m/.(请圈出以/m/开头的单词.)   What sound does Mouth/Mushroom/Mango/Monkey/Mat/Muffin/M begins with?引导孩子说 Mouth/Mushroom/Mango/Monkey/Mat/Muffin/M begins with the sound /m/.

Title: LA-U2 L5 Letter S
Content: 我们学习31-32课时Language Arts语文课Unit 2 Animals Around. Lesson 5 Letter S主要学习内容如下:【1】学习了高频词I, like. 关键句是 I have a big family.We like to go to school.【2】认识字母S并了解以字母S开头的单词【3】掌握字母S的发音并能在文章中找出以/s/音或者letter S开头的单词.【4】引导孩子们回想以/s/发音的单词,如 : Seal, Sink, Sandwich, Salmon, Sun, Snake, Snail, Spider, Salad, Soup【5】学习了小文章I like Ss. I like the ship. I like the seal. I like the sun. I like the s and the sandwich.本节课的关键句是: 【1】What is the letter? (这是什么字母?)It’s letter S【2】Which word begins with letter S? (哪些词是以字母S开头的单词?)Salmon/Sun/Snake/Snail/Spider/Salad/ Soup begins with the letter s.【3】Please circle the word which begins with letter S? (请圈出以S开头的单词)【4】What sound does letter S make? （S发什么音?）S makes the sound /s/（此处为自然拼读音标）.【5】Please circle the word that begins with the sound /s/.(请圈出以/s/开头的单词.)【6】What sound does Salmon/Sun/Snake/Snail/Spider/Salad(沙拉)/ Soup begin with?引导孩子说 Salmon/Sun/Snake/Snail/Spider/Salad/ Soup begins with the sound /s/.
